title: Resume Screener/Recruitment Admin
job_overview:
Requirements:
- 1+ year experience in recruitment or admin tasks
- Strong attention to detail
- Excellent English communication skills
- Can screen 100+ resumes per hour
- Organized, fast, and accurate
- Familiar with LinkedIn, JobStreet, and OnlineJobs.ph
- Proficient in Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Gmail)
- Reliable internet & remote-ready setup

Nice to Have:
- Experience in high-volume screening
- Familiarity with recruitment tools or trackers
- Fast learner and team player

Work Schedule & Compensation:
- Hours: 3–4 hours per day

Shifts Available:
- 2:00 PM – 5:00 PM
- 6:00 PM – 10:00 PM

100% Remote Work
